GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.19.8
GSD.description:
bpf: Do mark_chain_precision for ARG_CONST_ALLOC_SIZE_OR_ZERO

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit 2459615a8d7f44ac81f0965bc094e55ccb254717, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 457f44363a8894135c85b7a9afd2bd8196db24ab. For more details please see the references link.
